overview: When Captain Vek Tempus and his alien Space Squad crew get into an altercation with the evil Lady Gravatox, they're forced to escape through a wormhole and make an emergency landing on Earth. Once there, they struggle to find a way to make contact with their side of the galaxy, which proves difficult since everyone they meet assumes they're just people in ridiculous costumes.
tagline: A humanoid alien spaceship crew gets stranded on Earth, and must find a way to make contact with their side of the galaxy in order to stop a villain's nefarious plot.
title: Space People
